text: Ezɨ Sol, an ziar mam Pol, Godɨn Duam a gizɨvazɨma, a dɨkɨravɨra Elimasɨn gara kamaghɨn mɨgei,13:9 Ziar kam Sol, a Hibrun akamɨn otivir ziar mam. Ezɨ ziar kam Pol, a Grighɨn akam otivir ziam. Gumazir maba ghaze, Sol Grighɨn akamɨn mɨgeir darazir tongɨn ingara, egha kamaghɨn dughiar kamɨn a ziar kam Pol uabɨ garɨsi.
